title: Plane In French Alps Crash Considered Workhorse Of Commercial Aviation
teaser: According to aviation experts, the A320 Airbus is considered a workhorse of the skies and is constantly in service all over the world. The aircraft that crashed in the French Alps Tuesday was an A320 Airbus.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
